hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix.immutable

Class ImmutableSubmatrixViewAccessor2

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix.backbone.AbstractSubmatrixAccessor
      • hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix.immutable.ImmutableSubmatrixViewAccessor
        • hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix.immutable.ImmutableSubmatrixViewAccessor2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubmatrixAccessor, SubmatrixAccessor2

    public class ImmutableSubmatrixViewAccessor2
extends ImmutableSubmatrixViewAccessor
implements SubmatrixAccessor2
    Provides access to submatrix views of 2x2 immutable matrices. The views themselves are also immutable.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba

    • Method Detail

      • row

        public ImmutableVector2 row(int index)
        Description copied from interface: SubmatrixAccessor
        Returns an entire row. This function selects the elements between (row, 0) and (row, c-1) where c is the number of columns in this matrix, but returns these elements as a column vector.
        Specified by:
        row in interface SubmatrixAccessor
        Specified by:
        row in interface SubmatrixAccessor2
        Overrides:
        row in class ImmutableSubmatrixViewAccessor
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the row
        Returns:
        IllegalArgumentException if row is not a valid row index

      • column

        public ImmutableVector2 column(int index)
        Description copied from interface: SubmatrixAccessor
        Returns an entire column. This function selects the elements between (0, col) and (r-1, col) where r is the number of rows in this matrix.
        Specified by:
        column in interface SubmatrixAccessor
        Specified by:
        column in interface SubmatrixAccessor2
        Overrides:
        column in class ImmutableSubmatrixViewAccessor
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the column
        Returns:
        IllegalArgumentException if col is not a valid column index
